event.title: FSFE local group Berlin edu meeting (online)

body.p: The FSFE Berlin local group meets onlinei usually on the fourth Thursday of every month to discuss Free Software in education. In December the meeting will take place at Friday the 23rd. Stay tuned by subscribing to the mailing list or follow the group's social media account. If you have any questions, you can ask the coordinators. The meeting is in German and takes place in a BBB room, at 19.30 CET.
